description:
Shougo equips his Bone with the three young men Antonio, Luke, and Tyrone. By demonstrating that he can equip Dragon Bone with his own will, Shougo has proven himself a chosen warrior. Shougo doesn`t understand what`s going on, but Luke explains to him that Dark Bone is trying to steal the Bones of Earth, and if all the Bones are stolen, there is a chance that the Earth could be destroyed.
Source: crunchyroll
